lead_paragraph: Joe Pavelski and Joe Thornton each had three points to key a dominant performance from San Jose's top line, and the Sharks beat the Montreal Canadiens 6-2 on Monday night for their sixth victory in the past seven meetings between the teams.

headline.print_headline: Pavelski, Thornton Lead Sharks Past Canadiens 6-2
headline.main: Pavelski, Thornton Lead Sharks Past Canadiens 6-2

snippet: Joe Pavelski and Joe Thornton each had three points to key a dominant performance from San Jose's top line, and the Sharks beat the Montreal Canadiens 6-2 on Monday night for their sixth victory in the past seven meetings between the teams....
